thread.title: BRIEF-Arbitral Tribunal Decides In Favor Of Valeant In UCERIS Arbitration

title: BRIEF-Arbitral Tribunal Decides In Favor Of Valeant In UCERIS Arbitration

organizations.name: brief-arbitral tribunal decides in favor of valeant

text:
April 12, 2018 / 6:56 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Arbitral Tribunal Decides In Favor Of Valeant In UCERIS Arbitration Reuters Staff 
* ARBITRAL TRIBUNAL DECIDES IN FAVOR OF VALEANT IN UCERIS ARBITRATION 
* TRIBUNAL ISSUED A RULING REJECTING COSMO’S CLAIMS IN THEIR ENTIRETY RELATED TO UCERIS ARBITRATION 
* ARBITRAL TRIBUNAL ORDERED COSMO TO PAY ENTIRETY OF VALEANT’S LEGAL COSTS OF ABOUT $3.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
